message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of meeting you in the middle. How about we settle on $9500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to come down to that price?
I can see you're a serious buyer, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I think $9500 is still a fair price for this product. How about we meet at $9250?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above $9000. How about we meet at $9100?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make a deal. How about we meet at $9050?
I'm close to my target price, but I'm still a bit away. How about we meet at $8800?
